show.title: Investing in Regenerative Agriculture and Food

title: 144 Paul McMahon on building a 250M climate positive portfolio of tree crops in Europe
subtitle: 144 Paul McMahon on building a 250M climate positive portfolio of tree crops in Europe
summary:
A check in interview with Paul McMahon, co-founder of SLM Partners, to discuss their current focus and investment strategies in Australia, USA, and Europe. 
---------------------------------------------------

Join our Gumroad community, discover the tiers and benefits on www.gumroad.com/investinginregenag.

What are orchard systems? Why do SLM Partners, one of the most successful asset managers in regenerative agriculture, choose to focus on orchards, tree crops, perennial crops, etc. in Europe? How does the mechanizing of some agricultural processes promote regenerative agriculture?

More about this episode on https://investinginregenerativeagriculture.com/paul-mcmahon-2.
